alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:57PM CDT until July 29 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Monroe County in southwestern Illinois... Madison County in southwestern Illinois... Southern Macoupin County in southwestern Illinois... Northwestern Randolph County in southwestern Illinois... Jersey County in southwestern Illinois... St. Clair County in southwestern Illinois... St. Louis City in east central Missouri... Northeastern St. Charles County in east central Missouri... Central Jefferson County in east central Missouri... St. Louis County in east central Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jerseyville to Madison to Oakville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Widespread wind damage reported across northern St. Charles County. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Belleville, Granite City, Alton, East St. Louis, Collinsville, Edwardsville, Godfrey, Fairview Heights, Cahokia, and Glen Carbon around 400 PM CDT. O`Fallon, Swansea, Maryville, and Millstadt around 405 PM CDT. Shiloh, Troy, Smithton, and Dorsey around 410 PM CDT. Lebanon, Freeburg, Scott AFB, and Prairietown around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Mascoutah, New Athens, Carpenter, New Baden, St. Jacob, Worden, Marine, Highland, Marissa and Alhambra. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 21 and 30. Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 23 and 41. Interstate 64 in Illinois between exits 9 and 27. Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 272 and 277. Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 191. This also includes Scott Joplin Historic Site, Confluence State Park, Mastodon Historic Site, Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site, Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site, and Horseshoe Lake State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson; St. Charles; St. Louis; St. Louis City
